product_name: Mountain Travel & Rescue: National Ski Patrol's Manual for Mountain Rescue - 2nd Edition
long_description: . Softcover; 287 pages; black and white illustrations and graphics. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2012. Updated edition includes new backcountry medicine techniques, updated rope rescue and GPS technology information. . Final chapters review search and rescue techniques as well as appropriate responses to emergency scenarios.
short_description: Mountain Travel & Rescue from the National Ski Patrol provides a comprehensive guide to mountain survival and minimizing risk in the backcountry with clear, direct and approachable instruction.
